Minor note 
 PUT =3D Create a resource

Using 'create' can be confusing - =
perhaps 'set the state' of a resource is
better.
The reason 'create' can be=
 confusing is that folks may assume a PUT to a
pre-existing resource would =
be an error, when it isn't an error to set the
state of a pre-existing reso=
urce.
